price: Nokorε sε wͻn a wͻagye adie na wͻdi dwuma pa no, anigyeε Aheman no bεyε wͻn dea.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum jannātu al-naʿīmi
